content:
@Achille Roussel and I are forming a new Go-lang subgroup under the SIG-Guest-Language. If you'd want to be part of the Go lang subgroup, give this post a thumbs up!

Add a new Go subgroup and its organizing members by Mossaka 路 Pull Request #5 路 bytecodealliance/SIG-Guest-Languages
This PR adds a new Go subgroup and its organizing members. It also changes the "dynamic languages" to "guest languages" to be more aligned with the SIG. FYI @Kylebrown9
I have DMed everyone who reacted to this message asking an email address so that I can add to a mailing list. Please let me know if I've missed you!
@Mossaka (Joe) I'm interested, because I'm a heavy user of golang on wasm.
